website_summaries.verdict: Sand doesn't stick to this amazingly packable microfiber towel. Brush off any dry sand that settles with a simple flick of the wrist.
cons: Blows away easily, so be prepared to lay your beach gear on top of it if you unpack it before using it for drying
Should not be placed in dryer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great reusable dog bed
customer_reviews.text: Did not buy this for use as a towel. Sewed it in half with a large zipper, tilled it with cedar chips for my outdoor dog's bed. Cedar is better than hay as it dry quicker, deters mold and pests. The material doesn't mat our dog's hair, huge star for that. Best part is I dump out the chips, wash it in a bucket with Dawn, and fold it up for the next year. This is the 3rd year and it's held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Christain

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: My new everyday towel! I bought 1 for each member of my family of four. Let’s just say I don’t leave the house without them! We live in Florida and it’s summertime which means we are ALWAYS in the water. I LOVE that these towels dry super fast and are really pretty vibrant colors (I have gotten so many compliments and everyone wants to know where I got them). Yes, they are thin (which is the point) but that doesn’t diminish their usefulness. They are super light weight and have seriously cut down on the bulkiness of my pool/beach bag. I plan to buy one of every color! Worth the price, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: LizzyP

customer_reviews.title: Good product but be careful on the first wash.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these towels for our recent trip to Europe. They are lightweight, easy to pack and do their job as a beach towel. The beaches we went to were the pebble kind, so I can't tell you how they do with sand. But they dried quickly and were nice and big. My only negative is that when I washed them for the first time, I threw them in the wash with my new white microfibre pillowcases. I followed all washing instructions, but the dark colors on the stripes of the towels still bled onto my pillowcases and the white stripes of the towels. Other than that, these are great beach towels.
customer_reviews.author: lovin labs

customer_reviews.title: plush beach towel but I was pleasantly surprised how much I liked it after my first couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: This towel is not a big, plush beach towel but I was pleasantly surprised how much I liked it after my first couple of uses. Being 6'6" tall, I wanted to find the biggest, best beach towel available and although I was disappointed with how small it was when it arrived and contemplated returning it. I'm satisfied with this towel and compliments the other beach towel I take with me to the beach. I also like how soft it is and that it dries very quickly and is surprising very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Carlile

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product / have bought several of these in every color. They’re lightweight, travel easy, dry fast I believe that the manufacturers should do one thing to make the product even better and they would be 100%. The bag is a little snug / it should be 1 inch or two wider so that once you fold it it, it fits in there much better. It makes it difficult to repack otherwise I am in no way knocking the product because I love it but I would improve upon it by enlarging the bag just a bit. It works fine but all things can be improved
customer_reviews.author: Truthfulreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Dries Lightening-quick
customer_reviews.text: Simply wonderful. So compact, so light, and it drives lightening-quick. Bold attractive color, generous size. If you're not accustomed to using a microfiber towel, it may feel strange initially. It works better if you 'pat' yourself dry with it, but once you realize that, you'll learn to quickly appreciate this towel for it's many benefits.
customer_reviews.author: lilcreative

customer_reviews.title: It’s not your mom’s beach towel.
customer_reviews.text: Not what you’d expect from a beach towel - not particularly comfortable or absorbent. Also not like other microfiber products I have used in that there is no nap (fibers attached to the surface). All in all, I am at a loss to find any use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Hiker

customer_reviews.title: I want to order these for everyone I know
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOSH I LOVE. THIS. TOWEL. Bought two. I didn't quite understand why people were so excited about the microfiber or the bag, but I got this towel because of the high reviews and the affordable price. OMG NOW I UNDERSTAND. First of all, I loveeee the size, very big! The microfiber is thinner than most towels but it doesn't make it any less comfortable. The sand came off of it SO MUCH EASIER and it dried out so much faster. The bag is PERFECT. Two of these towels in their bags fit into my beach bag so perfectly. I'm in love. I want to order these for everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great towel for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This towel worked great for the beach. Sand did not stick to it and it dried quickly. I even used the towel to wipe off my feet before entering the house. Sand came off my foot and the towel. Great job!! The only thing I would suggest is that the storage bag is a stiff heavy canvas. It is rather rough on the hands. It would be even lighter to travel with if the storage bag was made out of the same material as the towel.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Best Towels EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best Towels that I have ever owned! Ordered the Large. Have used them at the pool and at the beach. They dry you off well, are soft, light weight, do not hold sand, and dry quickly. They fold so small, they are easy to pack! No more lugging heavy, wet, sandy towels from the beach or trying to fold and pack big cotton towels! These towels can also be tied around your waist or chest as a cover up. I cannot say enough wonderful things about these! Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: These towels are awesome!! The water dries immediately from the towel ...
customer_reviews.text: These towels are awesome!! The water dries immediately from the towel and material is so SOFT! They fit nicely folded back up in their little draw string bag. The extra long size fits over an entire fold out chair, except for about 4 in on the bottom. My boyfriend and I love these and will never buy a normal beach towel again! In addition, the company sent a very nice personalized email thanking me for my purchase, included information about cleaning the towels and I really appreciated that extra touch. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I bought the knock off - falling apart after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 and 4 are falling apart after 3 weeks. The elastic loop used for hanging didn’t hold up - it rips the towels seam open and falls out......now the seams are unraveling. I love the towels but wish I would have purchased the knock off brand. I paid for quality and didn’t receive it. I contacted dock and bay - their response was to contact amazon (dock and bay were the sellers on amazon). They offered no comment about their product’s lack of quality. Don’t buy for the brand!
customer_reviews.author: JPeacock

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy these again
customer_reviews.text: I had another brand of microfiber towel that costs more that I love so I decided to try these towels for my kids. These towels aren’t very absorbent and take forever to dry. My kids dried off for a snack on a swim day, I laid the towels out to dry but they continued to be soaked the whole day. My kids all refuse to use them now because they say they get too wet and don’t dry them off. This was not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mountain mama

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product / have bought several of these in every color. They’re lightweight, travel easy, dry fast I believe that the manufacturers should do one thing to make the product even better and they would be 100%. The bag is a little snug / it should be 1 inch or two wider so that once you fold it it, it fits in there much better. It makes it difficult to repack otherwise I am in no way knocking the product because I love it but I would improve upon it by enlarging the bag just a bit. It works fine but all things can be improved
customer_reviews.author: Truthfulreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Best beach towel!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this towel for a vacation and I did not regret it!! There are so many good things about this towel: it's compact, its absorbent, its large, it's stylish, it's a great value! I went on a trip with 3 friends and at the end of the trip I had sent my friends a link to this towel because they all wanted one! It is so handy to take when traveling most of all because it packs so small in your luggage. I took this towel to the beaches in Puerto Rico and the sand shook right off at the end of the day! I will be switching all of our bulky beach towels for these from now on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Busyfamilyof5

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive. Not like a regular beach towel.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but this is not a normal beach towel. It's slippery and doesn't stay in place well. Had a small tear in the fabric . I cintacted the vendor and didn't get an adequate response. The size is great though, very large.
customer_reviews.author: Racing Fan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing towel!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this towel! This towel is great I ordered the extra large version since I am tall.It's definitely huge which is what I was looking for. It dries very fast and doesn't hold the sand which is a huge plus when traveling. The little bag it comes with is super handy and a great added touch to fold the towel back up to put it into. I purchased the red stripe one and will definitely purchase the pink when it's back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Not so much a beach towel...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t really call this a towel.. it’s more like a thick sheet lol it’s very large which I like as I live in Vegas and when I’m laying out getting some sun, I drape it over the lounge chairs to prevent my arms from touching the arm rests and getting 3rd degree burns lol it does dry very fast but to use it as an actual towel to dry off, is a no from me.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie 🌻

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE- THESE ARENT REALLY TOWELS
customer_reviews.text: These are not towels. These are poorly made and non-absorb any pieces of cloth that I would compare to cheap off-brand under armour. Probably would be nice to lie on but there is no other use. These are non-absorbent and would work better for pushing water around a surface toward ANY OTHER SEMI-ABSORBANT OBJECT. How do you mess up towels?? I will never by from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: It wasn’t perfect for me but perfect for someone.
customer_reviews.text: This product was not for me. I wanted a long towel and a thick towel for my backyard pool. But if your looking for a thin, lightweight towel that absorbs well then this is definitely for you. Customer service was amazing, and if it was not for the simple fact that I needed a thicker towel as I get so much wind where I’m at then I prob would of stuck with it. I’m still giving it a 5 star because it is perfect if it’s what your looking for.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with this towel! It absorbs water very well ...
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with this towel! It absorbs water very well (technologies! Normally I would avoid synthetic materials) and, what I did not expect despite the ad, the sand really does not stick to it (provided it's not wet) so you don't risk bringing home tons of sand after the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best microfiber towels on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Best microfiber towels on the market. I have purchased various brands of microfiber towels over the years and the fabric has always been off. Either it was too stiff or it pilled and felt like sand paper. These are very soft, remarkably absorbent and HUGE. The extra large is about a quarter of the bulk of a standard towel, meaning you can easily fit 4 in a beach bag without feeling like you need a suitcase. I have already replaced all of my beach towels with these...now I am eyeing my bath towels and contemplating replacing them too.
customer_reviews.author: SOFLOFAM

customer_reviews.title: Not just a beach towel!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this beach towel!! Lightweight yet sturdy microfiber, mine was the blue and white and beautiful. Machine washed and dried several times already and comes out like new. I travel with my own towels and this towel was not only my beach towel during a trip to Mexico but my back up blanket as well! Buying more !!
customer_reviews.author: Maga loves her grand kids !

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It is the best beach towel ever. I didn’t write a review until I used it. It is light packing is excellent, it is fast drying and sand don’t stick if it was dry, I will buy another one again I took the large size it was just right to me.
customer_reviews.author: marayem jasem alhashash

customer_reviews.title: Girls Trip Beach Towel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these towels for a ladies beach trip taken in Sept 2018. To say I was hesitant that this towel was as good as the description would be an understatement. I WAS WRONG. My friends apparently also seemed skeptical when I gave them their towel and described how great the description was (fast drying, sand free, lightweight, etc). All of us agree this is the best beach towel we have ever owned.When I returned home I purchase another of these towels for a friend that was not able to make our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MICROFIBER. I know it's in the title it they are not traditional towels.
customer_reviews.text: These are microfiber. Not traditional towels, that being said, they absorb the water right off you, they just kinda stick to you and don't stretch (they don't slide on your skin), so they feel, odd. But I think they'll be awesome once we are used to them. P.S. They are big! And thin, so they fit in a very small bag. They roll up into about the size of a to-go coffee mug.
customer_reviews.author: So Cal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Was very wary of microfiber type towels and how they would actually absorb water.These are fabulous and I am very pleased. They soak up water immediately. Bought them for a catamaran trip and needed something that didn't take up much space. This fit the bill and I love the little bag it comes. Also was pleased that there isn't a "special" folding pattern to get it back in the bag. I am sure I will be getting more for the pool and beach. Would definitely recommend and I paid full price! :-)
customer_reviews.author: jazzygirl

customer_reviews.title: Need better quality control on seems
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the towel with green stripes. Fun, big towel. The problem is I have washed it once and now the seem is coming undone. As the seem comes undone, I can see that the sewing machine likely malfunctioned at that spot.
customer_reviews.author: Marj

customer_reviews.title: not super absorbent, but huge and doesn't let sand stick
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this towel and the size. Sand falls right off. It's not super absorbent, but we use it primarily to set our feet on in the hot sand and to wrap around my shoulders if it gets breezy. Love the loop to hang up and dry and it folds up nice and small when needed. I probably wouldn't buy another- but will use this one as long as it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel. It is a full sized towel you can wrap around a plus sized body. It does exactly what it says it will do. And I love traveling with my towel and will use it over hotel and/or family provided towels. And it dries out relatively quickly. If you do have to shove it in your bag for travel, just wring out what you can, wrap it in something else, and go! I will get another one eventually. :-) (purchased around Christmas 2018, loving since then! ;-) It's 09-07-19)
customer_reviews.author: doubletrouble48

customer_reviews.title: Space Saving and Dries Fast
customer_reviews.text: I got these towels after reading reviews from others. Our linen closet is overflowing with pool towels and we are constantly waiting on towels to dry and getting new ones out. These fold up to such a small size, they are SUPER light weight, and they dry you off after one swipe. The best thing is they dry very quickly and don't have that wet towel smell. I have already purchased more and will be slowly replacing my other pool/beach towels.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna S.

customer_reviews.title: Beach trip best buy
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. I bought this towel for a trip to Europe. I didn't want to go shopping once there and I didn't want anything bulky in my suitcase. This towel worked really well. It has a lot of style, plenty of room, sufficiently absorbent and dries quickly. It is a pretty good thickness too, I was happy both on the sand and on a chair. It was a little on the pricey side, but for me it was well worth it. I would really recommend it for a beach vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Emy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Towels
customer_reviews.text: We needed some lightweight beach towels to carry in our camper. These towels are perfect for that. It takes a little getting used to using a microfiber towel but they are great for camping because they don't take up as much room as a traditional towel and they dry a lot faster so less of a chance for the towel to mildew in the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Dale & Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach towels and very light weight
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 of these towels and they are perfect for beach or even pool towels. They are very lightweight and fold up very small which is great when trying to fit multiple towels in a bag for the whole family. We recently even took these with us on a trip to Florida as the condo we stayed at on the beach didn't have beach towels. Since we were flying we needed towels that didn't take up a ton of space and also wouldn't add a lot of weight to our bag . These towels also absorb a lot of water but yet still dry super fast unlike most beach towels. Highly recommend these towels!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stitching broke after a few months use
customer_reviews.text: I do like this towel. I have only owned since May and the stitching on one edge is already coming apart. We have two and only one had issues. We wash it as directed. I did see the one year warranty card when it arrived but didn't see I needed to register my purchase. Unfortunately you can't claim the warranty unless you register your purchase within 30 days, so just make sure you register! Bummed as it's an expensive towel we loved.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a month long trip through Italy. We only carried carry-on luggage so space was tight. I ALMOST didn’t pack these at the end because space in our bags was so small. But I’m so glad we did! They were probably our most used items in the trip. They were used at pools and beaches, as picnic blankets, and even once I put on my train seat because the AC was broken on the train and we were so sweaty. The pouch it came in was perfect to shove our keys, money, jewelry while we were swimming. So many people asked me where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Plastic feel towel
customer_reviews.text: Bought for trip haven't used yet, but has a plastic feel not towel feel. I like it because you can use it to sit on at the beach, and more lightweight than the other one I had. Don't think it will work as a towel to dry off with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty skimpy
customer_reviews.text: Got this to take to the pool at the Y. The good points are that it is attractive, folds up small, dries quickly, and has a little hook for hanging. However, I really do not like the feel of the fabric which has no nap or softness to speak of. Does not seem to absorb a lot of water so I feel pretty damp after using it. I use it in a pinch, but would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Toro

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with these small towels
customer_reviews.text: I am so very disappointed in this product.. it's supposed to be beach towels.. It weighed 1. lb 3 oz, so small I can't believe it.. You can see right through them..It arrived on time I can't say that with other things I've bought from you....
customer_reviews.author: Sharleen L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice towel. Thin
customer_reviews.text: Very nice towel. Thin, light weight and LARGE. I ordered the largest size available (35" X 78"). I needed something that was absorbent and would not take up a lot of room in my scuba kit, this was the perfect choice. Despite being thin and lightweight, it is well made, strong and absorbent. perfect for drying off between dives or just having a nice towel to fit into your bag for going to the beach. I'm fairly tall, which is why I opted for the larger size, smaller sizes are available at less cost, but I thought the price was great, less than you'd pay for a quality towel at some department stores.
customer_reviews.author: Neil A. Schoenherr

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is not a towel. It’s more like a table cloth. No way you could dry yourself off with it. It looks and feels like it costs a dime to make Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dang towel EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one on a whim for my wife who is a beach critter. I am only allowed to touch the towel if I am drying her back. Should have bought two. Later I did. Gave one to a graduating senior. She said it was her favorite gift. If you want, you can send me a free one and I'll buy two more for my cousins in Hawaii. No fooling, this is the best towel I've ever used. No sand, compact and absorbent. Oh, bought one for Mom because she took mine to Palm Beach. Claimed she lost it. Found it in her car trunk. Sneaky.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Got to test it out on the beach last week and it works as advertised. Sand came off no problem. Towel was soft and comfortable to sit on and even kept me warm when I wrapped it around me when the wind blew cold on the beach. Wish they had more pattern options but it's great for the price. Got the xtra large towel and it's comfortable sitting 2 people and fits 1 person when laying on it
customer_reviews.author: Anon_i_mus

customer_reviews.title: Very practical
customer_reviews.text: This towel is wonderful. I use it daily at the pool. I just hang it on a chair for half an hour and it’s all dry. It folds nicely and goes back into my backpack. I’ve also washed it a couple of times in the washing machine and it doesn’t seem like it’s lost any of its absorbency or softness.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesong

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd grader had to bring a towel to school each day for a swimming class for a week. I had visions of a moldy towel arriving home by the end of the day (considering it wouldn't dry, it's winter and he's not going to take care of it). This was dry and super easy to wash. And he liked it too because it was light.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Good Size but Too Light and Prone to Getting Dirty
customer_reviews.text: The towel was an appropriate size given what I was looking for, but it's incredibly lightweight nature makes it very prone to blowing away or folding over when blown by the wind. This was particularly problematic at the beach where even gentle ocean breezes would force me to re-adjust it or anchor it. It also became covered in blown sand within minutes of laying it out which is less than ideal. Lastly, the white stripes featured on all the towels in this line became dirty after the first use. Different color styles should be offered less prone to picking up dirt/sand/mud.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Towels!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best towels! Our family received three as a gift and they were so great that I ordered a few more. They are large towels but fold up nicely. I am able to fit 5 folded towels in a standard backpack and still have room for more items when going to the beach. They are very absorbent and dry quickly. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Henderso

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbant
customer_reviews.text: This is not your conventional cotton towel as it has a bit of a sticky feel to it, however it sucks up water like a sponge & quickly. It may take a bit getting used to, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: NHL is great

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to the traditional beach towel
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the most perfect summer towel. They are crazy soft. They're so bright. They're big and easy to wrap yourself up in. They're lightweight and fold up to such a tiny package, making it easy to cram a bunch into your pool bag. And they just wick water off your skin in seconds -- meaning they also dry quickly once you get home. Could there be a more perfect towel to take to the pool or beach?
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hiles

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something that would pack up very easily and I could take to the beach with me
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to pack and take on my vacation for a cruise. I wanted something that would pack up very easily and I could take to the beach with me. It worked sooo well. I use it all the time when I lay out at my pool too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Oxford

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber Towel
customer_reviews.text: Love the beachy look. The towel is a great size. Colors held up after a few washings. I only gave fours stars because it takes forever to dry hanging up. Did not dry overnight-material is a bit thick for microfiber. But can see why since it’s a dual bath/beach towel.
customer_reviews.author: Victa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this thing! Even though it’s not what it said it was
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t really a towel, but more of a beach mat. It wasn’t what I was expecting but I loved it! My boyfriend and I used it during our anniversary trip to the Outer Banks in North Carolina and we LOVED how convenient it was! It fits so cute and is huge! Super nice to lounge on :)
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Nice big size and easy to fold up
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the towel and it seems to be high quality. After I washed it, it was a bit softer, but it is not plush. It can quite useful for the beach and quickly drying off after a swim. What I like best is the size and it can fold down to fit easily in just about any bag. The loop to hang it on a hook seems useful too.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This towel is just perfect for those who need to carry a towel somewhere. I lap swim twice a week and use to take my bulky cotton towel around my neck because it is too large to fit in my swimming bag. With this towel that problem is gone. It doesn't give you the comfy feelong you get from cotton but it will dry you up at once. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhadames Tellez

customer_reviews.title: Much cooler than terry cloth.
customer_reviews.text: I live in the desert and get really hot laying out at the pool in the summer on terry cloth towels. I think this is going to be outstanding in high heat. I already love it in normal heat.
customer_reviews.author: clickclack

customer_reviews.title: It is great for the beach or easily covers any lounge chair
customer_reviews.text: I got the blue which is bright and vibrant - just as expected. I also got the XL size and that is the real highlight. It is great for the beach or easily covers any lounge chair. I wasn't sure if I'd like a "thin" towel, but I do. It dries very quickly -- even in high humidity. And its packs down so small (love the little travel bag it comes with. bonus!) so my beach bag isn't overwhelmed. I just sad it took me so long to find this towel.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel. I’m a flight attendant and I bring it on all of my trips. Especially these days it’s nice to have my own pool towel. When it’s time for us to take a beach vacation I’ll order more.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great for all trips
customer_reviews.text: I use this for ever flight to keep me warm! It’s great for vacations on the beach, a picnic, pale house, cruise. It rolls up so nicely and I love that it has a strap so I can attach it to a chair or a railing to dry
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E Knapp

customer_reviews.title: These towels are the best out there
customer_reviews.text: These towels are the best out there. I was looking for a towel to take to the beach and the pool. The large is pretty big. I'm not little and I always have a hard time finding a towel to wrap around me. So I ordered 2 large and 2 extra large. The large wrapped around me with ease. The extra large is wonderful! I will be ordering more for when I have company and we head to the beach, I will have extras. It really is worth every penny! The color is vibrant and it being pretty is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to gradually get more of these. We live at a beach and how nice it is to use these, rather than carry bulky towels. They fold small, weigh little, and dry fast. The price is very reasonable, compared to other brands of similar towels. I’m giving some as Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: B Jordan

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Better than I even expected. The quality is outstanding. Love the design, logo, and canvas bag. Will be taking with me on our sailboat trip in the islands. Thank you for this wonderful product. And the colors are fabulous!! Super fast ship too. Received in less than 2 days of ordering. Will be telling all my friends about these.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn McRae

customer_reviews.title: Great for many reasons
customer_reviews.text: I like how this does not attract sand and dries easily. It was also a nice size that you can wrap around yourself between the beach and the house. It does have a different texture than you might expect but it is absorbent. I would highly recommend this towel.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gantzer

customer_reviews.title: Quick drying, sand doesn't stick.
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel. It definitely feels more like a very heavy sheet but it is GREAT to take to the beach. It dried well before everyone elses towel, and sand was not an issue. Also, it is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: BEST beach towel for travel!!
customer_reviews.text: This beach towel dries so quickly and is so compact and great for travel. I love that it comes with a small carry pouch. 10/10 purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Makayla Shaw

customer_reviews.title: The towels are large and well made and dry fine. Now back from our trip these towels will ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a Belize trip that required tight packing. The towels are large and well made and dry fine. Now back from our trip these towels will become our standard beach towel. The tighter weave will pick up less sand. The well made cloth storage bag with drawstrings is a handy way to keep them for a quick grab to throw into a beach bag.
customer_reviews.author: GE BECK

customer_reviews.title: These towels are great
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 of those, love the fabric and colors. They feel very soft to the skin and super compact to throw in your bag anytime.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and absorbment
customer_reviews.text: I am all about being outdoors with all the necessities but lightweight and functional is key. The microfiber is soft to touch and is truly absorbent. No more heavy wet beach towels to carry back! This dries quickly and even partially we think is much easier to tote back. I purchased the XL and it's more than big enough! Highly recommend for the beach, picnics, yoga and more!
customer_reviews.author: Maars3

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Absorbs surprisingly well and the sand just dusts right off. Perfect when you have a beach pup that loves to steal the towel.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel towel
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for a vacation to Disneyworld and Universal. These towels were purchased to pack in a tote bag and back pack so if anyone got wet on the rides a towel could be handed to them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Avis Shiveler Brangan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight towels for pool.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these towels so I wasn’t lugging so much to the pool with kids. They are great and light weight and fold up easily. They aren’t particularly comfortable but they do try quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Hindsley

customer_reviews.title: Overall, its a nice beach towel.
customer_reviews.text: I got four of the xl as gifts for a family cruise. Beautiful colors, soft, thin and light weight. Im not sure how abosorbant they claim to be because after lying on one after a swim the towel was soaked but it did dry quickly. They only cons I have are that two of the towels had stains that werent noticed until after we left for vacation. I was hoping they would wash out but unfortunately, no. Also, the carrying bag of another towel is falling apart. I will be sending the two stained towels back and reordering.
customer_reviews.author: JMLou32

customer_reviews.title: Good for laying on a beach. Not sure about it’s absorbency.
customer_reviews.text: Decent towel. I don’t particularly notice it’s absorbency, but it does a great job repelling the sand. I mainly use it to lay on and then have a travel towel to dry off.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, perfect for beach, dries fast and repels sand
customer_reviews.text: I love this beach towel because it dries so quick and it does not hold on to sand like regular towels I also love the size
customer_reviews.author: Khrys Monet

customer_reviews.title: Great towel for RV
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice towels, it just takes some getting used to the thin design of the microfiber towels. We got these for the RV hoping they would dry faster than a standard towel and that is exactly what they do. We are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dale & Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not soft
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it has the texture of a cheap paper towel
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the towel. It is very thin but absorbs plenty of water and dry very quickly. They have been used almost daily this summer and have withstood pool water with little to no wear and tear. They are now a permanent accessory to our pool bag.
customer_reviews.author: John Sikking

customer_reviews.title: If you are packing towels for others, you will appreciate it.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. if you have Kids or more than just yourself going to a pool outing, you will APPRECIATE that your packing just decreased by 80%. These are perfect for pool drying, Chaise laying and wearing to dry off. Probably not thick enough for beach sand use. Also very affordable compared to camping brands are other box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C. Grace

customer_reviews.title: I like the colour
customer_reviews.text: Soft, smooth towel. Very absorbent, I just got back from the pool and didn't drip all over the car so that's a plus. I like the colour. Haven't tested it at the beach yet so I can't say for sure but it definitely doesn't seem like sand would stick to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Slagle

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a bed sheet that feels like a canvas
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love these towels!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these towels for my kids to use for swim team. They are great because they do not take up very much room like normal towels do. They dry quickly so my kids can use the same towel for the whole swim meet. They have held up very well- my kids have used them a lot and they are not showing any signs of wear. I am looking forward to trying them out at the beach this summer. No need for a giant beach bag because these towels are nice and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Priesman

customer_reviews.title: Beach towel
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling. The towel drys quickly and easy to fold up to place it back in the travel bag
customer_reviews.author: lisa s

customer_reviews.title: Different sized
customer_reviews.text: I love the towels and definitely worthy he &. Reducing 1 start because I ordered the same towel - XL one in blue and one in pink. They are not the same size (pink is much smaller) and the blue feels like it is a thicker material.. more absorb-ant. That said, we love the towels. Great for boating - we aren’t hauling big bulky beach towels back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel towel!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to pack a full size beach towel in about 1/3rd of the space than a typical towel in my suitcase. The fast drying nature of it is awesome! I took it camping/floating and it was the only thing on our clothesline that dried overnight (after being totally soaked and with lots of dew in the air). Can't wait to take it to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Heather2005

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they are microfiber. No, they aren't as thick as a bath towel. You can pack these things down to almost nothing (about as much volume as an XL T-Shirt), and they still hold a ton of water and dry very quickly. Perfect for traveling, or if you have a hike to the beach and weight/space is a concern. One of my better purchases this season.
customer_reviews.author: theCTgrower

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the "Extra Large" description fool you
customer_reviews.text: It is a lovely color and it comes with a cute bag, but definitely get your measuring stick out to make sure it is the size you want. I was really hoping it would be over-sized, where I could literally lay in a star fish position and not touch grass... but that's not the case. I'm used to soft towels too and this is more like tarp material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not RED
customer_reviews.text: Not RED! This color is certainly not red. I'd describe it as coral. I was expecting a bright nautical red. Nope! Nice thin absorbent towel. Poor color
customer_reviews.author: valerie boessling

customer_reviews.title: Love These I bought 3 of them.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these to keep in the RV. They take up less room than regular beach towels. The sand does not stick to it. They are a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Loves reading

customer_reviews.title: I liked the idea of this towel
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of this towel, but it just didn't work all that well. It wasn't that good at drying us off, and it certainly didn't dry out quickly. It certainly does fold up really small though to save space when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Michele R.

customer_reviews.title: more like cloth then towel
customer_reviews.text: more like cloth then towel we cover the sun lounger with it - still works i guess
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best towel ever!
customer_reviews.text: This towel is super absorbent, doesn't collect sand, dries fast, and very space saving! I plan to collect enough for my entire family and do away with traditional beach towels!
customer_reviews.author: frugalmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beach Towel
customer_reviews.text: Good sized towel that appears to be well made. The recipient loved it.
customer_reviews.author: dr11

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: Too thin, I could've used them as curtains. Material is about the same.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Draper

customer_reviews.title: ORANGE white and blue
customer_reviews.text: Good towel but my red white and blue came very orange white and blue 😢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Camping/Boating/Beach
customer_reviews.text: Like that it's lightweight, easy to pack, cute and extra large size :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Small Town MN

customer_reviews.title: Great towel
customer_reviews.text: These towels are amazing. I have bought them for myself, my parents, and my siblings. They are thin and take up little room for their size. The sand from the beach shakes off fairly easy, too. Best towel I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My #1 TRAVEL TOWEL
customer_reviews.text: Quick to dry, easy to pack and multipurpose...this is ALWAYS in my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Howrd

customer_reviews.title: This but effective.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and kids don’t like this towel, but I do. It’s very absorbent and dries quickly as advertised, but it does take a little getting used to. It is very thin so they don’t like it because “it’s not warm” after you get out of the lake, pool, etc. it’s kind of like drying off with a chamois.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: No more lugging heavy wet towels from the beach! The colors were pretty and bright. The towel is soft, light and thin because it is microfiber. It is absorbent, and I could pack 6 of them in my beach bag and have room for other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Excelllent for travel - doesn't hold sand
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is true that the towel is very thin, but its soft (not plastic-like at all) and most importantly is doesn't hold sand like a traditional towel, which is exactly what I wanted. Plus it's excellent for travel, folds nicely into its bag, is small and lightweight. The XL or largest size is perfect. Washes/dries easily, no special handling required.
customer_reviews.author: Wardrobe Relief

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel! It’s great for vacation, I got one last year for Europe and since it’s so small it travels so well! This one is a gift for someone!
customer_reviews.author: SAR823

product_meta.title: Dock & Bay Lightweight Beach Towel for Travel - Extra Large XL 78x35, Large 63x31 - Swim, Pool, Yoga, Travelling
feature_bullets: The original sand Free beach towel: the ideal quick Dry towel for travel. Dries 3 times faster than a normal cotton towel! A compact beach towel, includes travel accessory pouch.
Quick Dry material: feels different, dries great. You're going to love the smooth, soft feel and they are highly absorbent - sucking the moisture right off your skin!
Sand won't stick: leaving more sand at the beach for castles. As seen on bbc's dragon' Den (uk's version of shark Tank).
Perfect for vacation: our extra large size covers a whole sun Lounger and our towels (Excluding round) have a handy hook to hang your towel out to dry.
Satisfaction : love it or your money back. 30 day returns policy and 12 month included.
